sentence.Network_en: He looked at Ellen, breathing evenly in her sleep.
sentence.Network_cn: 他看着埃伦，她正呼吸均匀地睡着。

sentence.Network_en: "Is Mary Ann O.K?" — "She's fine," she said evenly.
sentence.Network_cn: “玛丽·安还好么？”——“她很好，”她平静地说。

sentence.Network_en: They must choose between two evenly matched candidates for governor.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们必须在两位不相上下的州长候选人之间作出选择。

means.word_mean: 1. in equal amounts or shares; in a balanced or impartial way;

sentences.sentence: "a class evenly divided between girls and boys"

means.word_mean: 2. in a level and regular way

means.word_mean: 平滑地；有规律地；均匀地；相等地

sentences.en: Apply the glue evenly over both surfaces.
sentences.cn: 在两面均匀地涂上胶水。

sentences.en: Apply the varnish evenly over the whole surface.
sentences.cn: 在整个表面上均匀地涂上清漆。

sentences.en: Sprinkle sugar evenly over the top of the cake.
sentences.cn: 把糖均匀地撒在蛋糕上。

sentences.en: Don’t make the paste too thick, or it will not spread evenly.
sentences.cn: 不要把酱弄得太稠，否则不易涂均匀。

sentences.en: Space your words evenly when you write.
sentences.cn: 写字的时候,字与字之间要均匀地分开。

sentences.en: The colour will not be evenly fixed unless the cloth is first properly wetted out.
sentences.cn: 如果不把布用水浸透,那么就不会均匀地着色。

sentences.en: The new machine distributes seeds evenly and quickly.
sentences.cn: 这新机器播种又快又匀。

sentences.en: I’ll try to spread out the work evenly.
sentences.cn: 我会尽力把工作平均分配。

sentences.en: Stand with your legs apart and your weight evenly distributed.
sentences.cn: 双腿分开站立，平均分散身体的重量。

sentences.en: The parliament was evenly balanced between the two parties.
Make sure the posts are spaced evenly apart.
sentences.cn: 确保各哨岗之间距离相等。

sentences.en: No two players could be more evenly matched.
sentences.cn: 再也找不到两个这样势均力敌的选手了。
